languages.text: "Я — ерети{mf|к|чка}? Либо он спятил от ужаса, либо видит ситуацию иначе чем мы".
"I'm the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very skewed perspective."
languages.original_text: "Я — ерети{mf|к|чка}? Либо он спятил от ужаса, либо видит ситуацию иначе чем мы".

traits.locale_text: "I am the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very different perspective on things."
"I am the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very different perspective on things."
"I am the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very mistaken perspective."
"I am the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very mistaken perspective."
"I'm the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very skewed perspective."
"I'm the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very skewed perspective."
"I'm the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very skewed perspective."

languages.text: «Conque yo soy el hereje. O el miedo le ha arrebatado todo uso de razón o tiene una perspectiva muy sesgada».
languages.original_text: "I'm the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very skewed perspective."

traits.locale_text: «Conque yo soy el hereje. O el miedo le ha arrebatado todo uso de razón o tiene una perspectiva muy equivocada».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}は異端者とな？恐怖で理性を失ったか、物の見方が極端に歪んでいるかのどちらかだろう」
languages.original_text: "I'm the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very skewed perspective."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}は異端者だったな？恐怖で理性を失ったか、物の見方に異常な誤りがあるかのどちらかだろう」

languages.text: “我反倒变成异端分子了，嗯？要么是这个人被吓得发了疯，要么是他的想法出了问题。”
languages.original_text: "I'm the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very skewed perspective."

traits.locale_text: “我反倒变成异端分子了，嗯？要么是这个人被吓得发了疯，要么是他的想法大错特错。”

languages.text: "Ich bin {mf|der Ketzer|die Ketzerin}, ja? Entweder hat die Angst ihm die Vernunft geraubt oder er hat eine verschobene Wahrnehmung."
languages.original_text: "I'm the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very skewed perspective."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin {mf|der Ketzer|die Ketzerin}, ja? Entweder hat die Angst ihm die Vernunft geraubt oder er hat eine völlig verschobene Wahrnehmung."

languages.text: « Alors, comme ça, c'est moi, l'hérétique ? De deux choses l'une : soit la peur lui a fait perdre la raison, soit son jugement est complètement faussé. »
languages.original_text: "I'm the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very skewed perspective."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, comme ça, c'est moi, l'hérétique ? De deux choses l'une : soit la peur lui a fait perdre la raison, soit son jugement est complètement faussé. »

languages.text: "Ben kâfirim yani, öyle mi? Bu ya korkudan aklını yitirmiş ya da son derece ön yargılı bir bakış açısı var."
languages.original_text: "I'm the heretic, am I? Either fear has robbed him of reason, or he has a very skewed perspective."
